body_html: @fmassa it would be great to have that, but we'd need an automatic conversion in case that grad would be used in a function not implemented for sparse tensors. Most backward functions would break if you gave them sparse grad outputs
body_text: @fmassa it would be great to have that, but we'd need an automatic conversion in case that grad would be used in a function not implemented for sparse tensors. Most backward functions would break if you gave them sparse grad outputs
body: @fmassa it would be great to have that, but we'd need an automatic conversion in case that grad would be used in a function not implemented for sparse tensors. Most backward functions would break if you gave them sparse grad outputs
